mapper.insert:
insert into sc_uc_user_basic (user_id, real_name, nick_name, user_sex, user_id_card, user_email, user_telephone, user_mobile, user_address, user_birth_day, is_married, user_source, status, update_time, create_time ) values
(#{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userBirthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isMarried,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
